article:
This is a partial list of 'Egyptologists'. An Egyptologist is any archaeologist,
historian, linguist, or art historian who specializes in Egyptology, the
scientific study of Ancient Egypt and its antiquities. Demotists are
Egyptologists who specialize in the study of the Demotic language and field of
Demotic Studies. Although a practitioner of the disciplined study of Ancient
Egypt and Egyptian antiquities is an "Egyptologist", the field of Egyptology is
not exclusive to such practitioners.
